author: financialcontent.com
title: The digital currency platform Enet Crypto Center Limited has gained favor among global users, featuring a unique user fund security system. | FinancialContent Business Page
text:
On December 20th, in a social media user-initiated poll for technology exchanges, Enet Crypto Center Limited (hereinafter referred to as Enet) won the favor of the majority of users. It ranked at the forefront in this event, thanks to its security and compliance. This indicates that Enet has allowed global users to experience secure and reliable digital asset trading services. It has gradually gained recognition in the market and has bolstered confidence in the platform to drive a more stable, secure, and reliable blockchain transaction system.
Trust is a scarce factor in current information transmission, a necessary element in building a digital mirror world, and the cornerstone of achieving real and credible digital transformation. Therefore, Enet prioritizes user fund security. Its independently developed system kernel-level security adopts an advanced multi-layer, multi-cluster system architecture. It integrates advanced technologies such as sharded storage and DAG technology into the multi-layered architecture of the exchange, significantly enhancing the system's security, stability, and scalability.
In terms of security, Enet has made more than one attempt. It is fully qualified, based on blockchain smart contract security. By empowering the financial field through blockchain, it comprehensively and multi-dimensionally ensures asset security. With strong R&D capabilities, anti-risk pricing mechanisms, risk reserve funds, and tiered reduction mechanisms, it achieves bank-level security risk control. Its goal is to ensure the protection of user data privacy, covering the entire data protection and governance system, and reducing transaction costs and risks.
Enet is well aware that technology needs continuous promotion by talents. The platform has gathered a group of encryption experts and security teams, with over hundreds of security personnel. They conduct in-depth market research, analysis, investment, and incubation in the encryption industry, study the latest hacker attack methods, and help establish a fair power structure in the Web3.0 system, placing security and privacy at the core of the system.
Enet meets the long-term investment and trading needs of users. It has always adhered to the development concept of "security" and "compliance." The platform equipment is high-performance servers selected through screening. Its risk management includes extensive order systems and trading tools for users. It provides the industry with relatively standardized solutions, also hoping to promote the industry's compliance and mainstreaming with its actions.
Enet builds a secure platform for investors at the most fundamental level, creating a unique compliance barrier that allows users to fully control their digital assets. This is why Enet can better cope with various uncertainties in the industry and maintain a leading position in the market. Enet also plans to increase efforts to protect asset security and shield global digital trade investments.
Disclaimer: The information provided in this press release is not a solicitation for investment, or intended as investment advice, financial advice, or trading advice. It is strongly recommended that you practice due diligence (including consultation with a professional financial advisor) before investing in or trading securities and cryptocurrency.
 Enet Crypto Center Limited
Contact Person: Janes
Email: Send Email
Country: Singapore
Website: https://enetcoin.cc/

author: Majô Gonçalves
title: Problemas que podem ocorrer com o desgaste do servo freio | SEGS Portal Nacional de Seguros, Saúde, Info, Ti, Educação
text:
Apesar de ter vida útil longa, o componente pode apresentar defeito como ruído ou pedal duro
O sistema de frenagem, composto por diversas peças, entre elas, o servo freio, é fundamental para evitar acidentes e garantir a segurança no trânsito. Conhecido também como hidrovácuo, o servo freio é um dispositivo que tem a finalidade de aumentar e distribuir a força exercida pelo motorista no pedal do veículo por meio do diferencial de pressão.
Barulho de ar escapando ao pisar no freio pode ser indicativo de comprometimento do servo freio. “A cada pisada no pedal, o servo freio capta ar da atmosfera, mas há um filtro que atenua o ruído. Caso o barulho seja contínuo, será preciso levar o veículo a uma oficina de confiança para avaliação”, comenta Vagner Marchiniak, Consultor de Marketing de Produto da Controil.
Outro indício de problemas é a dificuldade de acionar o freio, ou seja, pedal duro. “É possível que haja vazamento no servo freio”, afirma.
Segundo Marchiniak, a peça possui elevada durabilidade, mas caso apresente defeito necessita ser trocada, pois não admite reparos.
Com ampla cobertura de produtos para sistema de freio hidráulico para atender a frota circulante, a Controil investe no desenvolvimento de novos componentes e na modernização da sua planta de São Leopoldo-RS para garantir automação de processos que garantem mais precisão, oferecendo agilidade e aumento de capacidade.
Sobre a Controil – Fabricante de componentes para freios hidráulicos e polímeros com atuação em OE e no mercado de reposição, a Controil, uma marca Frasle Mobility, tem 66 anos de atuação. Possui planta fabril em São Leopoldo-RS, com padrão de qualidade de excelência e tecnologia de ponta em processos de manufatura, com certificações ISO 9001/2000 e IATF 16949.
Líder no mercado nas linhas de cilindro mestre e servo freio, a Controil produz também cilindro de roda, cilindro de embreagem, kits de reparo, além de mangueiras injetadas e materiais de borracha para vedação, reunindo o portfólio mais completo em seu segmento de freios hidráulicos.

author: Brice Louvet, expert espace et sciences
title: Des chercheurs font une découverte étonnante chez les Australopithèques
text:
L’évolution humaine est un sujet fascinant qui continue de captiver l’imagination des scientifiques et du grand public. Parmi nos ancêtres, les Australopithèques, qui vécurent il y a entre quatre millions et un million d’années, occupent une place importante dans ce récit évolutif. Or, une nouvelle étude nous apprend qu’ils pourraient avoir été plus semblables aux humains modernes que nous ne l’avions pensé, en particulier en ce qui concerne leur capacité à utiliser leurs mains.
Qui étaient les Australopithèques ? Les Australopithèques sont un groupe d’hominidés originaires d’Afrique, considérés comme les premiers ancêtres humains capables de marcher sur deux jambes. Parmi eux, trois espèces principales sont souvent mises en avant : Australopithecus afarensis (3,9 à 3 millions d’années), Australopithecus africanus (entre 3,3 et 2 millions d’années) et Australopithecus sediba (2 à 1,8 million d’années). Bien qu’ils partageaient certaines caractéristiques avec les humains modernes, ils conservaient des traits plus primitifs comme des bras plus longs et des crânes plus petits, ce qui les rendait encore partiellement adaptés à l’escalade.
Pendant longtemps, les scientifiques pensaient que ces espèces n’étaient pas capables de manipuler des objets de manière aussi complexe que les humains modernes. Une équipe de chercheurs de l’Université Eberhard Karls de Tübingen, en Allemagne, a toutefois récemment publié une étude qui change la façon dont nous percevons les capacités manuelles des Australopithèques.
Une utilisation d’outils plus précoce que prévu Dans le cadre de ces travaux, les chercheurs ont utilisé des modèles tridimensionnels pour examiner les os des mains et ont étudié les points d’attache musculaire qui sont essentiels pour comprendre comment ces ancêtres utilisaient leurs mains. Cette méthode leur a permis de déduire les types de mouvements et d’actions que ces hominidés pouvaient accomplir.
Les résultats de l’étude sont frappants : les Australopithèques semblaient capables de réaliser des mouvements de préhension et de manipulation , essentiels pour utiliser des outils. Cela implique que ces espèces se livraient à des activités qui nécessitaient de la dextérité bien avant que les premiers outils en pierre apparaissent il y a environ 3,3 millions d’années.
Il apparaît également que les Australopithèques utilisaient probablement des outils faits de matériaux périssables comme le bois ou les os qui n’ont ainsi pas été préservés au fil du temps, contrairement aux outils en pierre retrouvés dans des sites archéologiques. Cette hypothèse pourrait expliquer pourquoi les traces d’outils utilisés par les Australopithèques sont moins visibles dans les archives fossiles.
1 : Illustration des points d’attache des tendons sur le premier os du pouce droit chez un Australopithèque (gauche), un humain moderne (centre) et chez un chimpanzé (droite). 2 : Illustration des points d’attache des tendons sur la première phalange du pouce droit chez un Australopithèque (gauche), un humain moderne (centre) et un chimpanzé (à droite). Crédits : Journal de l’évolution humaine (2024) Les implications de cette découverte Cette étude ouvre de nouvelles perspectives sur l’évolution des capacités cognitives et manuelles de nos ancêtres. Si certaines espèces d’Australopithèques comme Australopithecus afarensis et Australopithecus sediba présentaient déjà des aptitudes pour la manipulation d’outils, cela repousse potentiellement l’apparition de la fabrication et de l’utilisation d’outils à un stade plus précoce que prévu dans l’histoire de l’humanité.
Traditionnellement, on pensait en effet que ces comportements étaient le propre du genre Homo , notamment avec Homo habilis qui signifie d’ailleurs homme habile en référence à ses capacités à façonner des outils. Cependant, les résultats de cette étude montrent que les Australopithèques pourraient eux aussi avoir eu les bases anatomiques nécessaires pour manipuler des objets et réaliser des tâches complexes. Cela change ainsi la perception que nous avions de leur intelligence . Plutôt que de les voir comme des hominidés limités à une vie simple et rudimentaire, ces découvertes suggèrent qu’ils avaient développé des capacités cognitives plus avancées qu’on ne le pensait auparavant.
Cela pourrait aussi amener à repenser les critères qui définissent la transition entre les Australopithèques et les premières espèces du genre Homo . Si l’utilisation d’outils n’est plus une caractéristique unique de Homo , cela signifie que des traits considérés comme déterminants dans l’évolution humaine étaient déjà présents chez des espèces plus anciennes. Cela renforce donc l’idée que l’évolution des capacités cognitives et manuelles s’est faite de manière progressive et non pas brutale.
En outre, les chercheurs croient que la manipulation d’outils a joué un rôle clé dans le développement du cerveau et des habiletés sociales chez les hominidés. Si les Australopithèques étaient capables de manipuler des objets, cela signifie qu’ils devaient probablement résoudre des problèmes complexes, organiser des tâches et peut-être même transmettre des connaissances au sein de leur groupe. Ces processus sont liés à des capacités d’apprentissage et de communication, des éléments cruciaux dans l’évolution vers des comportements plus complexes et des sociétés structurées.

author: @CiberCuba
title: Young man with elephantiasis remains in Cuba unable to travel to Spain
text:
Related videos:
The young Cuban Dayan Sotolongo, who suffers from elephantiasis in both legs, still cannot travel to Spain for surgery after a year of processing paperwork and seeking help online.
Dayan spoke live on Facebook with the activist identified as Pesca in Miami, and reported that during this time the government (the Ministry of Public Health) has denied him the document that explains that there is no cure for him in the country, which is necessary to process a humanitarian visa.
The 20-year-old from Pinar del Río, who can barely walk due to his illness, lives in rented accommodation in Havana and survives thanks to the support of people who provide him with food and money.
According to what he said, in October he was contacted by a doctor from Spain who was willing to operate on him.
Thanks to the solidarity of many people, he gradually managed to gather the money to cover the fare and entrance to Spain. The treatment is expected to last about two years, as he suffers from fourth-degree lymphedema in both limbs, a very serious condition.
Unfortunately, during the natural phenomenon of the DANA that occurred in December in Valencia, the doctor’s husband and son passed away, and she is still receiving therapy.
"That's why I haven't been able to leave yet. I'm waiting, I'm here in Havana struggling a lot, but thank God I haven't been lacking anything," he stated.
In May of last year, the comedian Andy Vázquez held a live stream to raise money.
"The only thing he needs to leave for Spain is the money for the ticket. As you can see from his legs, he has to travel in first class because he doesn’t fit in a regular seat. The first-class ticket costs 1,700 dollars (on average) and his sister's ticket is 800. That would total 2,500 dollars," Andy explained.
Frequently Asked Questions about the Case of Dayan Sotolongo and the Medical Situation in Cuba
Why hasn't Dayan Sotolongo been able to travel to Spain for his treatment?
Dayan Sotolongo has been unable to travel to Spain because the Ministry of Public Health of Cuba has refused to provide him with the necessary document that certifies there are no means to treat his illness in Cuba. This document is crucial for applying for a humanitarian visa. Moreover, although he has raised part of the money for his trip and treatment, he continues to face bureaucratic obstacles and lacks the total amount needed for first-class tickets, which are required due to his physical condition.
What is elephantiasis and how does it affect Dayan Sotolongo?
Elephantiasis is a condition characterized by severe lymphedema that causes an increase in the size of the limbs due to fluid accumulation. Dayan suffers from stage four lymphedema in both legs, which prevents him from walking properly and causes significant pain. His case is complex and requires specialized treatment that is not available in Cuba.
How has the Cuban healthcare system handled the case of Dayan Sotolongo?
The Cuban healthcare system has been ineffective in treating Dayan, even denying him a temporary solution or a clear diagnosis. Despite his serious condition, the Ministry of Public Health has not provided him with the necessary documents to seek treatment abroad. In his testimony, Dayan has expressed that, although he has received visits from officials and doctors, he has not obtained the promised help or the necessary resources for his illness.
What support has Dayan Sotolongo received from the community and activists?
Dayan has received financial and moral support from sympathetic individuals, activists, and public figures, such as comedian Andy Vázquez, who organized a fundraising campaign to help cover some of his travel expenses. He has also been aided by a doctor in Spain willing to perform the surgery, although she has been unable to proceed due to a personal tragedy. The Cuban community has demonstrated solidarity in response to the inaction of the Cuban government.
What other similar cases of medical difficulties exist in Cuba?
The case of Dayan is not unique. Other cases, such as that of Damir Ortiz Ramírez, a child who requires treatment in the United States for a serious eye disease, demonstrate a pattern of bureaucratic obstacles from the Cuban Ministry of Public Health. These situations reflect a healthcare system that often fails to provide adequate medical care and allows patients to seek treatment options abroad.
Filed under:

enviado:

Iker está atribulado: alguien (no queda claro quién) está pidiendo su cabeza. Para encorajarlo, uno de sus editores le ha hecho un videíto con la «cronología» de la «noticia» de los no-muertos del parking de Bonaire. Por la pantalla desfilan, uno tras otro, todos los colegas (competidores) que metieron la pata. Mal de muchos, consuelo de tontos. En Horizonte, Iker mienta el vídeo pero no lo pone: un periodista no debe colocarse en el centro de la noticia; si usted siente curiosidad, corra a Twitter.

organizations.name: Iluminación de la Plaza de Toros de València

author: Redação Tribuna do Norte
title: Com 4 mil ingressos vendidos, América aposta na vitória e em ação social para manter clima positivo - Tribuna do Norte
text:
O primeiro balanço divulgado pela SAF do América apontou que quatro mil torcedores já garantiram presença na Arena das Dunas no próximo domingo (27), quando o Alvirrubro enfrenta o Horizonte-CE, em duelo decisivo pela última rodada da primeira fase da Série D. Brigando ponto a ponto por uma das duas primeiras posições do Grupo A3, o América busca retomar o caminho das vitórias em casa para garantir, no mínimo, o segundo lugar — o que lhe garantiria a vantagem de decidir o confronto do mata-mata como mandante.
Diante da expectativa elevada entre torcedores, elenco e comissão técnica, a diretoria decidiu quebrar o clima de ansiedade e levou os jogadores para participar de um evento social, deixando o futebol de lado, ao menos por algumas horas. A ação marcou a entrega dos alimentos arrecadados durante a festa de aniversário dos 110 anos do clube, realizada no dia 13 de julho, na parte externa da Arena das Dunas, antes do duelo contra o Central-PE.
A mobilização resultou em uma tonelada e meia de alimentos não perecíveis, confirmando o papel social do clube e o envolvimento da torcida em campanhas solidárias. Os donativos fizeram parte de um total de mais de seis toneladas arrecadadas em conjunto com outros eventos realizados na capital, e foram destinados a 16 instituições da Zona Oeste de Natal, por meio do Programa Banco de Alimentos de Natal, que atua na promoção da segurança alimentar.
Concluída a ação social, o foco se voltou novamente para a decisiva rodada final da primeira fase. Além do confronto direto com o Horizonte, o América acompanha de perto os duelos envolvendo os concorrentes diretos: Central e Santa Cruz-PE. Em caso de vitória contra o time cearense e tropeço do Central diante do Ferroviário-CE — que ainda luta pela classificação — o clube potiguar pode terminar a fase de grupos na liderança. Para evitar isso, o Santa Cruz-PE precisaria golear o Treze-PB no Arruda. Por exemplo, se o América vencer por 1 a 0, os pernambucanos teriam que fazer pelo menos 4 a 0 para superar os americanos no quesito de gols marcados e avançar na primeira posição.
O lateral-esquerda Rennan Siqueira, que participou de nove das 13 partidas do América nesta Série D, destacou a importância do próximo compromisso: “Esse jogo contra o Horizonte é fundamental para nossas pretensões na competição. Precisamos garantir a primeira colocação, pois ela nos dá uma vantagem considerável nas próximas fases. Decidir em casa é sempre importante, ainda mais com o apoio da nossa torcida. Por isso, vamos entrar muito concentrados para fazer o nosso melhor jogo e chegar confiantes no mata-mata.” Aguardando a definição do técnico Gerson Gusmão sobre a titularidade, Rennan valorizou o desempenho coletivo da equipe.
